responses: Hello! How can I help you today?
Hi! What farming help do you need?
High rainfall areas are suitable for Rice, Rubber, Jute, Tea, and Sugarcane.
Best crops for black soil: Cotton, Soybean, Wheat, Jowar, Sunflower.
Red soil supports Groundnut, Millet, Potato, and Ragi.
Best summer crops: Maize, Millet, Groundnut, Okra, Watermelon.
Best winter crops: Wheat, Mustard, Gram, Peas.
Good crops for 28°C: Cotton, Tomato, Chili, Groundnut.
Major crops in Maharashtra: Cotton, Sugarcane, Soybean, Grapes, Pomegranate.
Use compost, green manure, crop rotation, and reduce chemical fertilizer use to improve soil quality.
You can test soil at your nearest Agriculture Department center or Krishi Vigyan Kendra (KVK).
Recommended NPK for wheat: 120:60:40. Use Urea, DAP, and MOP.
Rice needs NPK ratio 100:40:40. Apply Urea and DAP in split doses.
Best organic fertilizers include cow dung, vermicompost, poultry manure, and green manure.
Sugarcane needs NPK 200:80:80 and organic manure for better yield.
Control cotton bollworm using Emamectin Benzoate, Spinosad, or Chlorantraniliprole.
Rice blast can be controlled using Tricyclazole 75WP and maintaining field drainage.
Aphids can be controlled using Neem oil, Imidacloprid, or releasing ladybugs.
Spray Neem oil, Triazophos, or use yellow sticky traps to control whiteflies.
Best irrigation methods include drip, sprinkler, furrow, and flood irrigation depending on crop.
Drip irrigation saves water, reduces weed growth, and increases fertilizer efficiency.
Please check IMD or Google Weather for accurate rainfall updates.
Check IMD cyclone warning system for high-accuracy storm alerts.
Please check Google Weather or IMD for live temperature updates.
Cotton rates vary by district. Check APMC or e-NAM for latest prices.
Soybean price changes daily. Visit your local mandi or e-NAM.
PM Kisan provides ₹6000 yearly to farmers in 3 installments. Apply on pmkisan.gov.in.
PMFBY is a crop insurance scheme covering natural disasters. Apply through CSC or agriculture office.
Goodbye! Have a great farming day!
See you soon! Stay safe!
